name: Boink (An Idle Game)
description:
Boink is a game about placing bumpers to increase the amount of money you have. The objects that shoot out of the cannon have their value on it, placed bumpers will increase the value! Purchase upgrades from the menu to buff your setup!

The game saves automatically!

CONTROLS

  • Left Click
  • Right Click (Closes Build Menus)
  • TAB (Open/Close Build Menus)
  • ESC (Open/Close Main Menu)

HOW TO PLAY

1. Press TAB to open build menu

2. Press 'Build Menu' to build bumpers for cannon shots

3. Purchase Upgrades in 'Build Menu' for various improvements

4. Click placed bumpers to upgrade or delete

5. Press ESC to quit game or reset game
